summary: This module defines a class that encapsulates the retrieval and handling of authentication data for Conan remote services. It reads credentials from environment variables, supports tokenâ€‘based or username/password authentication, and integrates optional authentication plugins to supply the necessary headers for REST calls.
business_intent: Provide a unified, secure way for Conan clients to obtain and apply remote repository credentials, enabling seamless and extensible authentication when communicating with package servers.
